# ldesign-spin



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Spin 加载指示器组件

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description     | Type                             | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `delay`    | `delay`    | 延迟显示加载效果的时间（毫秒） | `number`                         | `0`         |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | 自定义图标           | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | 尺寸              | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |
| `spinning` | `spinning` | 是否加载中           | `boolean`                        | `true`      |
| `tip`      | `tip`      | 提示文字            | `string`                         | `undefined` |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [ldesign-icon](../icon)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  ldesign-spin --> ldesign-icon
  style ldesign-spin fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
